titles: Pueriles confabulatiunculæ: or Childrens dialogues Little conferences, or talkings together, or little speeches together, or dialogues fit for children.
author: Gallus, Evaldus.
Brinsley, John, fl. 1581-1624.
publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Thomas Man,
notes: A translation by John Brinsley of Gallus, Evaldus. Puerile confabulatiunculæ.
"To the reader", at end, is signed: I. Brinsley.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Latin language --  Conversation and phrase books --  Early works to 1800.
